channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.31

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Dates label is now correct when used with utc formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an option to remove the action button in the header while adapting the UI of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with date time mismatch for American time zone on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.108.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.23

  • Library: sap.fe.common
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now align the column correctly when the table entity has no key
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where OData service was triggered twice for each sorting event in a table
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection and highlighting with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.List/Table: Accessibility improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: preserve H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6 tags default 'display' CSS property
  • Library: sap.ndc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc: Add one parameter to enable/disable Barcode Input Dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now setting the correct variant while saving a tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that registering a filter provider at the message button helper works fine even if outdated binding path info is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: Record selection on the UI table is now cleared after executing the function import action
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Padding when there is no menu button fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController: Duplicated indexes of the Columns fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: reset now works as expected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing: find parent route from the router of the inheritance parent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autowaiter._timeoutWaiter: Callback arguments corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.Toolbar: Fix failing qUnit tests in Firefox

item.title: Version 1.108.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.25

  • Library: sap.fe.common
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover works correctly when the messages for an action are displayed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale attribute are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when the manifest setting uses a contextPath parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale attribute are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid duplicate GET requests when a user clicks the Go button in the filter bar of a value help dialog
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix error on opening Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Fix hiding of popover due to re-rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DraftIndicator: JSDoc corrected
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that persisted while refreshing the table after executing the function import action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now improved our logic to set the focus on the first editable field on the object page when switch to edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Clean up actions are now performed correctly when the transient message dialog is closed in all the scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: An error message dialog is now displayed instead of navigating to the 'Object Not Found' page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the back navigation in fixed column layout when a draft is cancelled in between
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: remove focus catcher
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: property enabled handling corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: fire data received event if request is aborted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#_getPropertyMetadata: fix for complex type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Fix grouping of Application filters in OperationMode.Server
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

item.title: Version 1.108.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.24

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the list report, semantic date is now shown when default values are maintained
    • Type: FIX, Description: While checking for an equivalent key, sibling entity is not considered now during draft creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added custom data to use FLP timezone for smart table in the analytical list page and list report object page
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Context menu now successfully opens on items with 'href' set
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Label is now properly updated and displayed on UoM scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Empty operator for Edm.Guid type now sends default guid instead of empty string
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: Tooltip is correctly set for numeric fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantConverterTo: Exclude sign is now correct for multiple ranges
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: applyVariant now respects given order of items as argument
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Single filter field doesn't select row if there are multiple rows with same key
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.26

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: The value help's type-ahead functionality now works as expected when the initial automatic focus is put on a field directly after a user created a new table row
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Escape text value when creating tokens with validator
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: correct uniqueness detection when TextArrangement is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed regex after translation change
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Press event of Go button is now correctly fired
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: RichTextEditor: Undo and Redo with keyboard do not work
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.108.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.30

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code update
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: enhance check for wrong values of filter fields

item.title: Version 1.108.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Visual misalignment of percent value fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the page variant correctly during external navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the focus handling logic for non-draft apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: PDF Export - Apply limit

item.title: Version 1.108.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the code to accommodate the changes related to the hostname in the response from the gateway
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the method for detecting data loss to support nested app routes in My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the URL parameter, save-appvar-id, when initiating the app
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests

item.title: Version 1.108.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.33

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now retaining the semantic date value correctly in the user defined variant on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that 'modifyStartupExtension' changes in the filter bar are retained post refresh
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: ComboBox valueState is now correctly reset
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Improve PDF export error handling

item.title: Version 1.108.32 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.32

  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now provide an option to define title and button label in case of the NewAction with parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now enhanced the approach to define the title for new action dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now make sure that the function import parameters return an empty string instead of null
    • Type: FIX, Description: The UI fix now freezes when Enter key is pressed on an embedded app component
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the function import scenario, a value is now passed as undefined if a user tries to remove it from the field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the dump issues in case of queue failures

item.title: Version 1.120.17 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.17

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon is shown correctly now for theme horizon HCB and HCW. The status is now aligned correctly in sap.ui.table.Table.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Reset now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description path in display mode is correct when having expandNavigationProperties set
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: InputState of Model is now cleared
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: copy button of the table is now enabled based on the selection
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix non-expanding Table

item.title: Version 1.120.18 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.18

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided the option to enable or disable the appearance of multiple ghost shapes upon dragging in Gantt 2.0
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
  • Library: sap.ndc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc:After closing the dialog, the focus will return to button
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle the 412 transient errors and display the errors in the message popup
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Custom image icon is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.120.19 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.19

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: actionBarExpanded now works when there is only one action item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnMenu: Check for container instance when setting visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle user filter queries during inline creation on object page tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow you to save draft messages regardless of state warnings or 412 error messages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the table variant state not being set correctly after the application was upgraded to a new version
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Uncaught error when TextOnly and GUID is fixed now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now optimised the SmartMultiInput control to render efficiently
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins
  • Library: sap.uiext.inbox
    • Type: FIX, Description: Missing deprecation labels of sap.uiext.inbox in the documentation

item.title: Version 1.120.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.21

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the selection of a shape in Gantt chart irrespective of the row index
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the unused orphaned connector instances are destroyed correctly in cases where the related shapes are not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now modified AggregationUtils method to avoid considering dragDropConfig as a shape aggregation of row settings
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Fixed incorrect ACC reading of required sap.m.Select
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: adjust screen reader announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.DatesRow: render week numbers
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageHeaderContent: correct box-shadow styles

item.title: Version 1.120.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.11

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that integer type fields can be used in mass edit scenario from SAP UI5 version 1.120
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the list report properties for multiple views annotated using UI.SelectionFields are available among other filter bar properties
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now convert the select options of the value help from the source app to the correct filter conditions in the target app
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the list report properties for multiple views annotated using UI.SelectionFields are available among other filter bar properties
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: Is truncated correctly in sap.m.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Search is complete announcement now has correct result count
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Currency model update in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers

item.title: Version 1.120.12 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.12

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: When applying the iAppState, we now wait until the object page is ready and then set the selected section
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when the manifest setting for an object page uses a contextPath parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the intent parameters of SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with row selection in a context-dependent value help dialog with multiple selections.
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: When applying the iAppState, we now wait until the object page is ready and then set the selected section

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select

  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.120.14 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.14

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that recommendations are correctly displayed on the table without console errors
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with date time mismatch for American time zone on the analytical list page

item.title: Version 1.120.15 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.15

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The dropdown list suggested in mass edit fields with empty units and currencies now includes the value help option when available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly set the default selected item in the Mass Edit dialog when no values are available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly set the default selected item in the Mass Edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation using a button
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly request the count of all visible tabs on the ListReport
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the object page, the subsection info object is not initialised now when the replace facet extension is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now showing an error message when a file with unsupported media type is being uploaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ignore the url parameter 'save-appvar-id' while initialising the List Report application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added a check for nested nav property while fetching default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the ETag validation for Preparation call

item.title: Version 1.120.16 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.16

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that led to the loading of the sap.insight message bundle twice
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the processing of the ODataListBinding in the Define Conditions tab
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise failures
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issues with the dynamic update of overlays in the expanded row scenario
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now retaining the semantic date value correctly in the user defined variant on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the display of column labels in Add Card to Insights preview dialog when i18n texts are used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are mow invoking 'resumeSetFilterData' while initializing the filter bar to consider user entered filter data on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: 412 confirmation pop up now show transient warning messages if no state warning messages are available

  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs

item.title: Version 1.120.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.10

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the useSingleTextAreaFieldAsNotes setting in the manifest to allow end users to choose to hide the label of the single text-area field in a form

item.title: Version 1.124.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.1

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the MultiValue fields don't create additional requests in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Value is now marked as selected in value help on the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an additional parameter for the enableMinimalContactsCollaboration API
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now showing an error message when a file with unsupported media type is being uploaded
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog fix data not loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Empty string value is now handled correctly in case of SuppressEmptyStringRequest
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/UIComponent: Fix access to routing config
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now fix the performance issue while executing an action against multiple contexts
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadSetwithTable: Set correct path definition for sap.m.Link

item.title: Version 1.124.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.2

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where values selected from the value help could not be removed in the group view of the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the multi-input field did not appear
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the intent parameters of SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now provide a tooltip for an avatar in a contact card
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display phone numbers on contact cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've refactored the code for the Microsoft Teams collaboration API to make it asynchronous
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support CollaborationMessageConsumer for SCube scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now showing the subtitle correctly on the design time card
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the issue with the analytical list page's ExtensionAPI.getSelectedContexts method to return the applicable contexts for the context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the display of column labels in Add Card to Insights preview dialog when i18n texts are used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider insert and update restrictions in order to display the paste button on the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now invoking 'resumeSetFilterData' while initializing the filter bar to consider user entered filter data on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided tooltip for avatar controls in contact cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: 412 confirmation pop up now shows transient warning messages if no state warning messages are available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now adding hyphen instead of empty string for header field values in Microsoft Teams adaptive card unfurling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description path in display mode is correct when having expandNavigationProperties set
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: InputState of Model is now cleared
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.ui.rta: Show error dialog in case catalogsIds is returned empty from backend during catalog assignment for key user app variants.
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements (SFSF)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view

item.title: Version 1.124.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects work correctly when the manifest setting for the object page uses a contextPath parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid duplicate GET requests when a user clicks the Go button in the filter bar of a value help dialog
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
    • Type: FIX, Description: Design-time cards can now be shared correctly using SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls outside of a table that have validation errors and back-end errors
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added a delay in scrolling if horizontal lazy loading is enabled for any charts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided the option to enable or disable the appearance of multiple ghost shapes upon dragging in Gantt 2.0
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed the unfurling issue with the production app for share as chat
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed unfurling issue for systems with different domain patterns
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField reverted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Label is now visible when cloned reverted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Label is now visible when cloned
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: correct layout when HBox is used as custom control
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: setBasicSearch does not throw an exception when called with 'null'
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: basicSearch should be rendered once if the SearchField controls is added in the view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now optimised the SmartMultiInput control to render efficiently
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.

item.title: Version 1.124.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add additional field binding information for fields with TextArrangement set to TextOnly, to avoid adding a field twice when using key user adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that sort order works correctly for value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that MultiValueField is correctly editable in a table with the creationMode set to InlineCreationRows
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application correctly loads the default variant with the custom operator
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support easy filtering by allowing end users to use natural language search terms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now handle the user entered filter during inline creation on the object page table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the filter option in the list report applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now pass the correct entity set for easy filters in the list report
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SFBMultiComboBox now updates the model when single value is passed from In parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation

item.title: Version 1.124.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.5

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the subsections that are dynamically invisible on the anchor bar of the object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise failures
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the subsections that are dynamically invisible on the anchor bar of the object page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now modified AggregationUtils method to avoid considering dragDropConfig as a shape aggregation of row settings
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the selection of a shape in Gantt chart irrespective of the row index
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the unused orphaned connector instances are destroyed correctly in cases where the related shapes are not visible
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Implement onfocusfail logic"
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced the fileSize parameter in fileSizeExceeded event of UploadSet
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now fixed lengthy link unfurling URL for cloud systems.
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've added an easy filter on the list report page without enabling structural changes to the smart filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the count on the dynamic tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct layout when SmartFilterBar is used in freestyle VH Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've optimized the number of time model APIs that are invoked up on the selection or deselection of a smartMultiInput item when it is rendered as a multicombobox
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust link in sap.ui.core.MessageType documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core: handle focus properly when disabling

item.title: Version 1.124.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.6

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation after a document creation works in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly merge the default export settings with the precedence settings from the manifest file for columns with overwritten export settings
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the SubSectionEntered event handler is executed only after the completion of the object page rebind
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now specify leadingProperty on p13nData for semantically connected columns on tables
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.124.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an email address is correcty parsed
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate Adapt Filters button displayed on the analytical list pages

    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: model value of single filter field is correctly updated when there is validation request

  • Library: sap.uxap

item.title: Version 1.124.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.7

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping

    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the save-appvar-id url parameter while initiating the app
