item.title: Version 1.124.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.9

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that occurred when adding additional filters to the Adapt Filter dialog in the analytical list page applications

item.title: Version 1.125.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.125.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly encode the hash used for email URLs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure a state check for empty rows with duplicate IDs is added
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now overwrite localization messages for Save and Create actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the generic message for actions that fail with strict handling with the action name
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure sorting of columns using navigation properties is done correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation still works in apps using the flexible column layout after navigating to another application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show recent values in the correct order according to the values in the filter field, with the latest at the top
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation using a button
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the ValueListParameterOut annotation works correctly also when it is used as the description of the value help’s field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a value help with a typeahead opens without errors.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the width of the typeahead table is changed when window is resized
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that reading from undefined conditions is avoided in the type-ahead functionality of the value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that BindindInfo filters are properly set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the TimePicker is shown for FilterFields of type Edm.TimeOfDay
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a keyboard shortcut to return to the error list while editing the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now disable the 'Delete' shortcut when the Delete button is not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display SAP Fiori launchpad when a user discards a draft by navigating back using the shell button if the object page is the first entry in the browser history
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
    • Type: FIX, Description: The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the message popover is no longer shown in display mode for messages added using the table API addMessages
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced isTrustedSource property within sap.m.upload.UploadItem, specifically to preview the pdf type files
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Accessible Improvement for More Link
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Added "ariaLabelledBy" association
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add additional detail to moreLinkPress event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: new noData aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Tokens creation on paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarView: update JSDocs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: add documentation for getters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Keyboard navigation is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: remove unnecessary scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Samples adjustment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Step number is read out
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile: Handling the visbility of the more button inside the IconMode tile when inscribed inside the GridContainer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Addapted control after deprecated property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: center icon in month view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Displayed pages are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Aria-roledescription is removed
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Fixed non image comparison failure
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog fix data not loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: copy of tokens with conditions now works properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: evaluate 'entitySet' earlier
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: change event now provides correct value when constraints are violated
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Correctly show filters when FilterBar is used on phone in ValuehelpDialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization: column freeze no longer blocks settings dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: change event is now fired for fields with calendar annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: change event is now fired for fields with fiscal annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Empty string value is now handled correctly in case of SuppressEmptyStringRequest
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeType: Fixed when don't have json on initialize
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Items for MultiComboBox are now properly set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/UIComponent: Fix access to routing config
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
    • Type: FIX, Description: Core: add documentation on the usage of the Core module
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Adjust index tree legal links separator position
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadSetwithTable: Set correct path definition for sap.m.Link
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Table dialog enhancement
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader : FileUploaderHelper is loaded from an absolute path
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: implement WCAG 2.2 compliance for focusable items
  • Library: sap.ui.vk
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix point cloud groups highlighting during edit
    • Type: FIX, Description: collapse/expand button focusable for acc
    • Type: FIX, Description: pdf drawertoolbar overflowed when initialise
    • Type: FIX, Description: wrong translatable string used for tooltip
  • Library: sap.ushell
    • Type: FIX, Description: utils: Make storeSapSystemToLocalStorage sync again
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ui.footerbar.AboutDialog: Headline heading level corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: GUI apps: Bring back minimal header for headerless mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Provide stub for UserDefaultParameters.getValue
    • Type: FIX, Description: ApplifeCycle: getAllAppInfo returns invalid parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ui.launchpad.VizInstance: Press handling caused a console error based on the Tile State.
    • Type: FIX, Description: EventHub: Avoid setTimeout'ed execution
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Prevent errors
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#autoResizeColumn] replaced by {@link sap.ui.table.Column#autoResize}

item.title: Version 1.126.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Avoid double header focus visualization
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify function names for beforeRebindTable and selectionChange events in tables used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a context menu for tree tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use buttons in the tree table toolbar to move a selected node before its previous sibling or after its next sibling
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In a tree table, you can now show newly created nodes at the position computed by the back end, for example by taking sorting into account
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use a manifest parameter to set the default creation mode in tables to InlineCreationRows
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the operation grouping mode for mass edit changes in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify which fields can be included or excluded from the Mass Edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the sorting and removal of table columns work correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message when a subset of rows is updated in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with showing custom filter fields in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message when no changes are made in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer show the technical messages from the default OData V4 model in the message dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly merge the default export settings with the precedence settings from the manifest file for columns with overwritten export settings
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function in the routing controller extension supports the preserveHistory parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the navigation properties in the filter bar
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify function names for beforeRebindTable and selectionChange events in tables used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the additionalSemanticObject value in an object page used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a context menu for tree tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use buttons in the tree table toolbar to move a selected node before its previous sibling or after its next sibling
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use extended ‘TO’ and ‘FROM’ filters with single date operators in the Save as Tile option and xApp state scenarios
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In a tree table, you can now show newly created nodes at the position computed by the back end, for example by taking sorting into account
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable the Editing Status filter field in the list report page of draft enabled applications
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the operation grouping mode for mass edit changes in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify which fields can be included or excluded from the Mass Edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the sorting and removal of table columns work correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help with conditional Common.ValueListForValidation annotation works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where values selected from the value help could not be removed in the group view of the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly translate the header form label of an object page and the data fields in field groups of line items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the multi-input field did not appear
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now added the description property to the FieldAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input fields with value help now have description binding to a JSON model using a description attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message when a subset of rows is updated in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Discard Draft popover is shown correctly when the browser window is resized to a smaller size
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with showing custom filter fields in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the intent parameters of SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that led to unnecessary update of fields when opened with mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message when no changes are made in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the control IDs for data points considering the parent view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now add additional field binding information for fields with TextArrangement set to TextOnly, to avoid adding a field twice when using key user adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a table with a custom column shows data in an adaptation project
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a table didn't load properly due to undefined binding contexts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that accessibility is correctly set for the fields in edit mode using collaborative draft feature
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works correctly with links as well
    • Type: FIX, Description: Value is now marked as selected in value help on the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the MultiValue fields don't create additional requests in display mode
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now specify the additionalSemanticObject value in an object page used in an adaptation project
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that stashed controls in the header of the object page no longer trigger data request
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly translate the header form label of an object page and the data fields in field groups of line items
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the value Auto for the initialLoad setting in list report for UI adaptation projects
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now provided a new side panel control for placing a custom control within the Gantt Chart Container
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the option to hide non-working hours in Gantt chart for the Stepwise Zoom strategy
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled auto focusing while zooming in on a selected shape
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue that caused unintended row bindings while interacting with draggable shapes in the chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issues with the dynamic update of overlays in the expanded row scenario
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: remove empty indicator when rendering icon
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: missing title announcement for each row
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.LightBox: Error message is available for screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Value state message link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: Documentation: Parameter types are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: redundant haspopup attribute removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: fire press onkeyup
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: enable mouse selection for More link
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Fine tuned code control after deprecated property
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: RadioButton - focus overlaps text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: improve demo app sample reagarding accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now provided two updates for MicroCharts, first, we have changed the minimum tap area within the charts to 24px to adhere to the latest ACC guidelines, and second is that a menu is now presented upon right-clicking on the comparison microcharts
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: Border styles now have correct values in all themes
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartTable: The filter settings dialog now supports the dynamic date range control
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description path in display mode is correct when having expandNavigationProperties set
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: description is now correctly handled in display mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct layout when SmartFilterBar is used in freestyle VH Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Single fields are now correctly populated
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: InputState of Model is now cleared
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog fix data not loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: table.Personalization: Do not convert fiscal date strings to Date object
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: correct layout when HBox is used as custom control
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context#requestSibling: fix request syntax
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Demo Kit: Support line-through tags
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Improve Scrolling in Landscape Mode on Mobile Devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix API reference search result list item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Version-info initialization corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: IndexEntry controller definition corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widget.Card: Add fitType property to icons in List and Table content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Introduce displayZeroValue option for StackedBar micro chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: All elements of a List card item are read out
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: expander announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.FilterBar: improve focus handling of filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: The filter info bar must be labelled with its text
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: old unit used after Field was initialized
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: parsing nested brackets
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Key user app variant delete button is always disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Prevent set focus on not existing key user app variant overview table
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: change event fire once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: adjust change event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: change cursor for header buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: remove redundant required announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Currency: the currency is not truncating now
  • Library: sap.ushell
    • Type: FIX, Description: FLP restart: Clear `sap-usercontext` cookie
    • Type: FIX, Description: Classic Homepage: Link tiles don't have a delete button
    • Type: FIX, Description: about dialog fiori id changes in cFlp
    • Type: FIX, Description:  AppLifeCycle: Don't wait for Component in Non-UI5 cases
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Inconsistent header-collapsing corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with selected SubSection
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.comp.navpopover.NavigationPopoverHandler#attachNavigationTargetsObtained] replaced by <code>navigationTargetsObtainedCallback</code> property.

item.title: Version 1.126.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.1

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where design-time changes caused errors on overview pages
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript

item.title: Version 1.127.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Invalid resize prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Cleanup move listeners on destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer show the dialog of the create action if all the parameters are hidden
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying a hierarchy within a value help
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now move nodes up and down using the context menu in tree tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve now increased the loading threshold to 100 when scrolling in a non-responsive table
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation works correctly with high latency networks
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the condensed mode of the grid table works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where a generic error message was shown after a successful action with warnings for non-strict handling

item.title: Version 1.127.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application correctly loads the default variant with the custom operator
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField reverted
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: The field value is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Calendar with two months in one column is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.127.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Go button is also triggered when users navigate back to the app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the requestAtLeast properties are included in the table export
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the field change event name remains consistent with the public API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField now fires change event with opened suggestions

item.title: Version 1.127.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an email address is correcty parsed
    • Type: FIX, Description: FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: The table export now works correctly after a create action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our method to detect data loss to support nested app routes for My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation

item.title: Version 1.127.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.4

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly evaluate the InsertRestrictions and UpdateRestrictions while rendering the paste button on the object page table
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer pass the empty function import parameters to the backend

item.title: Version 1.128.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.128.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.CardBase: Introduced CardBadgeCustomData
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: New layoutData introduced
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: icon with empty src is not rendered in the expanded side content
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now increased the default column size in forms for medium and large size screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
    • Type: FIX, Description: The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a navigation to an empty draft entity was triggered just after the creation of a new entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved our documentation for the controller extensions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: Wrapping the content of custom columns now works correctly when exporting
    • Type: FIX, Description: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the outbound navigation for a contained entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The main navigation and additional links in a quick view now provide implicit semantic object mapping
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now increased the default column size in forms for medium and large size screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the table shown in a value help is correctly destroyed when the value help dialog is closed
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now remove the columns displaying values from navigation properties that contain currency and unit properties and add the columns back using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header of building block columns is properly cached in the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header level for titles in the quick view is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the field change event name remains consistent with the public API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly show the column header of line items annotated as dataFieldForAnnotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that sort order works correctly for value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the dropdown list loads all values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers inform users when an upload file is mandatory
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation for properties of the Column building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a link in the FileWrapper also wraps long filenames with no spaces
    • Type: FIX, Description: The mass edit functionality now works correctly when the SideEffects annotation contains an asterisk
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
    • Type: FIX, Description: The enableFullScreen option now also works correctly on tables outside of an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the titles of form containers and form action toolbars when sending information to a section
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request the field description if the table is refreshed using the mass edit functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the UI.HiddenFilter annotation was not correctly applied to the chart filter option
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure links of email addresses aren’t truncated when the screen is resized
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the default message strip for a draft-enabled app was incorrectly displayed on the chart of an app that was not draft-enabled
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided a detailed description of the setAsSectionTitleOwner ExtensionAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now provided an original JQuery event as a parameter in shapePress and shapeContextMenu event of Gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the shape selection is retained while clicking on an empty space with the CTRL key, if ShapeSelectionMode is either MultiWithKeyboard or MultiWithKeyboardAndLasso
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now provided certain documentation updates for print changes
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar and SinglePlanningCalendar: Adding the ability to repeat non-working periods
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Keyboard arrow navigation added

item.title: Version 1.129.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.129.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed resizing when Side Panel is left-positioned
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: fixed side content closing on mobile device
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Header now has correct height when only toolbar is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix Popover scroll in sample
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix pin button visibility
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the DoNotCheckScaleOfMeasuredQuantity annotation to skip validating decimal digits in a unit-specific scale
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check the parameter type only if there is a parameter value present in the startup parameters or default values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly read Boolean parameters that have no value when triggering an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct message when an action is triggered for multiple rows in isolated mode and the message target is in the action parameter dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that page navigation after a document creation works in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UI.ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works properly even when a value is set for the Exclude property in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that led to the loading of the sap.insight message bundle twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Edit button works correctly on a subobject page in sticky mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now paste data into the ReadyOnly columns of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the value type when parsing default values in startup parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the header form of the object page coming from a navigation property works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message when no data is available in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the table copy in all value help dialogs
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: End users can now use the up and down arrow keys to select options in the Editing Status filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the sort order for custom data from SortRestriction of value help, if it isn't included in the presentation variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didn’t update when navigating from an external app
    • Type: FIX, Description: The table export now works correctly after a create action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now deactivate optimistic batch requests when initialLoad is set to Disabled in the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display an appropriate message after changes are saved in the mass edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: The main navigation and additional links in a quick view now provide implicit semantic object mapping when a dynamic semantic object is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly wrap the header text in the ObjectStatus control if it is longer than the available screen width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the items included in the FileWrapper are treated as one control by screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of empty fields with a quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: Visual filters now work correctly if the aggregatable property is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct size of DataPoints is used in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly align the Datapoint in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
  • Library: sap.fe.navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now properly handle the iAppStateHybridDeferred promise failures
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now show an illustrated message when no data is available in a chart
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support key user adaptation for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the UI.ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works properly even when a value is set for the Exclude property in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that binding parameters are created correctly when no alternate keys are provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
    • Type: FIX, Description: The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now paste data into the ReadyOnly columns of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now added the carousel behaviour, and increased the tap area for the indicators on the SlideTile control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessageStrip: Displaying multiple links is now enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier & ObjectNumber: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: show busy indicator while rows loading
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Prevent null within area resize observer deregistration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Icon explorer scroll fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Revert
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Fix error caused by inaccessible DOM ref
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Return correct row contexts when grouping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: add empty value description in the acc info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Title link is now truncated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Empty page message resizes correctly in vertical direction
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE without scrolling the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NavContainer: Unstable test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Token: extend touch area for horizon themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: navigate to correct month in islamic calendar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: prevent default before press for mobile safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Label: Asteriks is visible when parent container has a set width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed sap-desktop attribute to provide consistent focus across all devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add today announcement for the grid cell
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectListItem: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: prevent press on right click
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Icon on Firefox is not cut now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: align the placeholder reference with other inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: Accessible Improvement for ObjectIdentifier test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that UploadSet does not insert or removes any item if they are bound to a model
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendar: Change in the z-index of the header
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: The valueStateText is given priority.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: fixed "select all" checkbox positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Revert some of resize handle size changes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalettePopover: synch selected color with inner palette
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We ensure that the UploadSetwithTable plugin now uses currentContexts for file preview
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Proper positioning of a non-work period.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the content maintained within the GenericTile does not extended beyond the control
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fixed the spacing between links
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: properties string values are escaped when creating internal controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Added missing documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickView: Title and description wrap correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: set default width
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now display the Copy to Clipboard button in tables even when the selection mode is NONE
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Adaptation project now supports modification of the application-level settings in the SAP delivered apps
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The action buttons in the object page header now have borders
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Support Collaboration Manager for H2H Chat
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now prevent the inline row creation when the table's item binding is obsolete to avoid activation issues
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue with the adaption of section tabs in an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the nonInsertable property for Paste scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: You now use the Esc key to close the Contact Details popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now resolved an issue where columns with semantically connected fields didn't appear in the exported file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Insights cards show the correct criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with Unicode characters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an error message is displayed when a user navigates to the object page through a table in flexible column layout mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filenames with characters that aren't a part of ASCII characters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the performance of the sharing design time cards using SAP Collaboration Manager
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the removal of horizontal and vertical layouts from object pages during adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now adjust the section titles in the message popover when they are hidden in the content area
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the logic to hide the columns in the smart table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the ShellTitle correctly in the Save as Tile dialog for analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the theme color parameters for Microcharts to fulfil the minimum contrast requirements
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartField now reads criticality from DataPoint and FieldGroup annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Fix alignment of filter items and label cut-off in different languages
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove description column if descriptionOnly or idOnly is used for the key
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: fetchVariant not removing empty filters if setFilterData is suspended
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: The field value is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: conversion for Edm.Int data types with 0 as value is now correct
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: Samples failing tests fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/DataState.js: consider also the control dirty state of the parent data state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat: allow parsing empty string for Currencies and Units if showNumber is false
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Icon sample - ensure style.css is loaded
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix query parameter only for documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Change info fixed

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.fl.write.api.FieldExtensibility: Adds information about relevant business objects to the extension data.
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the formatting of smart fields in the function import dialog

  • Library: sap.ui.integration

    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: List 'info' is now correctly displayed
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
